dict.string: Today is ten days, which are one week and three days, of the Omer.
Hoy es diez días, que son una semana y tres días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est dix jours, qui sont une semaine et trois jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ДЕСЯТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ОДНУ НЕДЕЛЮ И ТРИ ДНЯ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם עֲשָׂרָה יָמִים שֶׁהֵם שָׁבֽוּעַ אֶחָד וּשְׁלֹשָׁה יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר

Underlying and driving discipline must not only be love, but also compassion. Love comes from recognizing one's merits and positive qualities, while discipline channels and directs those strengths and weeds out the negative.
Compassion is unconditional love. It is love just for the sake of love, not considering the other's position. Tiferet is a result of total selflessness in the eyes of G-d. You love for no reason; you love because you are a reflection of G-d.
Breaking Down the Highest Level of Empathy
Rabbi Simon Jacobson breaks down the highest level of empathy by telling a story of the Mittler Rebbe.
Be compassionate to someone you have reproached.
Does my discipline have this element of compassion?
